com.im.njams.sdk.settings.provider

Class PropertiesFileSettingsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.settings.provider.PropertiesFileSettingsProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SettingsProvider

    public class PropertiesFileSettingsProvider
extends Object
implements SettingsProvider
    Implements a SettingsProvider that loads and saves settings to a specified file in common Properties format.
    Allows recursively loading parent properties via key "njams.sdk.settings.properties.parent".
    Author:
    cwinkler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_FILE
      Default configuration file name.
      static String FILE_CONFIGURATION
      Property key for specifying the path to the properties file to be used as settings.
      static String NAME
      Name of this implementation that has to be used to configure SettingsProviderFactory.
      static String PARENT_CONFIGURATION
      Default property key for loading parent (default) configuration file.
      static String PARENT_CONFIGURATION_KEY
      Allows to override the default parent file key ("njams.sdk.settings.properties.parent").

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PropertiesFileSettingsProvider()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(Properties properties)
      Configures this FileSettingsProvider via the given Properties.
      File getFile()
      Get the File where Settings are stored.
      String getName()
      Returns the value "propertiesFile" as name for this SettingsProvider.
      Settings loadSettings()
      Loads the Settings from the configured file, or returns a new empty Settings if the file does not exist.
      void setFile(File file)
      Set the File from where Settings should be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(Properties properties)
        Configures this FileSettingsProvider via the given Properties.

        Valid properties are:

        • "njams.sdk.settings.properties.file"
        Specified by:
        configure in interface SettingsProvider
        Parameters:
        properties - to configure

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the value "propertiesFile" as name for this SettingsProvider.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface SettingsProvider
        Returns:
        the name of this SettingsProvider

      • loadSettings

        public Settings loadSettings()
        Loads the Settings from the configured file, or returns a new empty Settings if the file does not exist.
        Specified by:
        loadSettings in interface SettingsProvider
        Returns:
        the Settings

      • getFile

        public File getFile()
        Get the File where Settings are stored.
        Returns:
        the currently set file, which may be a default.

      • setFile

        public void setFile(File file)
        Set the File from where Settings should be loaded.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load from. If the given File is a folder, the "config.properties" file is loaded from that folder. Must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given file does not exist, or the default configuration file does not exist in the given folder.
        NullPointerException - if the given file is null
